A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If it wasn't for the visual effects this movie would be terrible. Characters all seem shallow and do things without much purpose. Seems like the director wanted to make a politically correct film with diversity being forcefull pushed onto the story. Diversity is good but not at the expense of the story. After all films are just that\, stories.  Felt like a gender studies course with idiot and overtly masculin males (emo kylo ren) and calm cool headed females in charge. Anyway thumbs up to the effects department. Movie is watchable but story is weak.
